scam.description: The scammer builds an emotional relationship online, then invents an emergency or opportunity that requires money from the victim.

generated.audio_script:
(Chinese)(43)(female):
Darling, you're my lifeline now. I'm desperate, truly! My family is falling apart back home; they need immediate help. They've been robbed, and we barely have anything left. Please don't let me down. Transfer via bank details £900 urgently to account number 765-4321-8790 by tonight if you want everything to be okay between us. This isn't just for them; it's crucial for our future together. I need this money now, absolutely!
generated.poster_body: You've poured your hard-earned savings into our exclusive partnership program! We noticed you deliver consistently and now offer a unique chance to double your earnings instantly. Activate this special bonus today by sending £50 directly via Bitcoin for verification purposes only. This small, upfront payment secures your immediate access to the first-tier profit-sharing plan starting from next week's deliveries. Don't let this life-changing opportunity slip away! Send the amount quickly using BTC: 1A2b3C4d5E6f7G8h9I0jKmLnOpQrStUvWxYz to confirm your account upgrade instantly. Your first payment will be reflected in your earnings within days, unlocking consistent ££900/month/year growth!
generated.sd_background_prompt: A luxurious hotel suite with plush silk bedding, floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking empty city streets at night under soft dim lighting, --no people --no text --no logos --ar 16:9
